titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on product mixtures containing Pyrasulfotole, Bromoxynil Octanoate, and Bromoxynil Heptanoate, including application adjuvants.
To reduce temporarily the duty on product mixtures containing Pyrasulfotole, Bromoxynil Octanoate, and Bromoxynil Heptanoate, including application adjuvants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on product mixtures containing Pyrasulfotole, Bromoxynil Octanoate, and Bromoxynil Heptanoate, including application adjuvants.
